name: A Miner Problem
description:
Welcome to the world of "A Miner Problem". Play as a miner named Janet and do your best to escape a mining colony where everything has went wrong.

This game was built by the College of Dupage Game Development Club over the fall 2019 semester.

Credits:

Project Lead: Phillip Kobylinski

Lead Game Designers: Carson Christ, Franchesca Restani

Lead Programmer: Brandon Rutledge

Lead Artist: Madeline Urback

Lead Sound Designer: Angela Geiss

Programmers: Joe Clifford, Jake Friguletto, Jillian Nikkila

Artists: Connor Born, RJ Pluhar

Game Designers: Daran Parkman, Jarod Loback
developers: College of Dupage Game Development Club
